commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm too nervous to sleep.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm going to try messaging her.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu, it's finally happening tomorrow. I wanted to share my gratitude before your performance. Thank you so much for joining the school idol club with me!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What are you saying? I'm the one who should be thanking you.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, but I did want to ask you for a favor. I want you to tell me, "Try your best," like you always do. I think that will really help me try my best tomorrow!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Try your best, Ayumu! I'll be right by your side watching tomorrow!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hi, Kasumi. It's finally happening tomorrow. Are you nervous?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hiii! Thank you so much for messaging me! I'm not the least bit nervous. More importantly, make sure to keep your eyes on me tomorrow. You're in for a surprise!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* That sounds promising. I'll make sure not to take my eyes off of you for a single second tomorrow. Try your best!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shizuku, it's finally happening tomorrow. I'm really excited to see you up on stage!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Thank you so much. I feel like my expressiveness has really improved. I think it's thanks to the group practice! I can't wait to show you what I can do tomorrow.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I can't wait either. I'm looking forward to a performance so amazing I won't be able to tear my eyes off of you!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Are you still awake, Karin? I can't sleep, so I thought I'd shoot you a message. I'll be cheering for you as hard as I can tomorrow.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Too nervous to sleep? *Chuckle* Me too. I was just about to message you myself.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm glad I'm awake then. It's weird for me to be this nervous though, huh? You're the one who's going to be standing on stage.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'll take it to mean you're really putting yourself in my shoes.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I feel like I'm more nervous than if it were me! Karin, try your best tomorrow! I'll be watching from your side the whole time.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ai! I can't sleep!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Who cares if you can't sleep?! That's my line!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ngh, I'm sorry.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Just kidding! I'm always happy to get a message from you! And you know what else? You need to believe in me, 'cause I'm gonna blow everyone away with my performance tomorrow!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* I'm relieved to hear you say that. You're really amazing, Ai. I won't take my eyes off of you tomorrow!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kanata, I can't wait to see you enjoying yourself with all your might today! I'm sending this late at night, so that you can see it first thing in the morning.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'm awake, I'm awake! I'm awake for once! The usual drowsy Kanata is too nervous to sleep tonight.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: But messaging you made all of my nerves disappear. Thank you. Nighty-night.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Good night, Kanata. Sweet dreams!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's finally happening tomorrow, Setsuna! I'm too excited to sleep!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Me too! I think this is my first time literally trembling with excitement. But tomorrow's a day I've been waiting for for a long time, so I'll try my best! Make sure to watch me!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course! I can picture your powerful performance even now. Have fun tomorrow, Setsuna!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Emma, it's finally happening tomorrow. Try your best! I'll be right by your side watching!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Wow, I'm so happy you messaged me! I received messages from my siblings in Switzerland earlier too. They said they're cheering me on from afar.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: *Giggle* I have people close by and people far away cheering me on. I'm so excited for tomorrow I can't stand it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: There are tons of people that see you trying your best and want to cheer you on. I think you'll be able to see that for yourself tomorrow!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Rina, are you nervous? You didn't have that much time to practice alone because of the group lessons. I was worried and felt like I should message you.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm fine. Looking forward to it even. Because tomorrow I can perform for you.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm actually really happy we had group lessons. You have no reason to be worried. Please watch me tomorrow.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thank you, Rina. I'll be right by your side watching you tomorrow!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (At last, it was the day of the competition. Everyone looked like they were having fun while performing. Nijigasaki's members entering as solo acts was the right call!)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You're all amazing! At this rate, Nijigasaki really will take over the finals!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, I got a much better response than last time.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Me too! I think the group lessons really motivated me.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Right? We were able to teach each other our skills. Ai taught me how to get the audience fired up. I'm going to try it out today.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: It'll definitely work! Give it a try!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: What rankings make it to the finals?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's...um...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: What's wrong?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ow, ow, ow. My leg is cramping up. Maybe from nerves? Haha—oww, it hurts!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: O-Oh no!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Ayumu, please sit here!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Where does it hurt? The bottom of your foot? Your calf?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ngh... Th-The calf.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Ayumu, I'm going to take off your shoe. This might hurt a little, but I'm going to stretch out your leg. Please try to bear it.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ow, ow, ow...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Just a little longer.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Y-You can do it, Ayumu! It's udderly devastating that your calf hurts, but don't have a cow! I'll put you back in a good moo-d!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Laugh* Ai, don't make me laugh! It hurts to laugh!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Oh, the tightness disappeared. I think you're better now.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh? Oh, you're right.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Drink some water, Ayumu. Sometimes leg cramps are caused by dehydration. Being too cold or tense can be bad too, so you should keep your track jacket on as long as you can.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Did...my pun just heal Ayumu's injury?!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: No, no, it was thanks to Setsuna.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Laugh* I think Ai helped too.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You distracted me from my pain.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: See, Ayumu said I helped too! Puns are great in any situation!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Hahaha!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, Ai is up next! Break a leg! You've got this!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: All right, here I go! I'm in a super good mood now! Make sure to check me out!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I really love Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Even if the members stand on the stage alone, they all help each other and lift each other up behind the scenes.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The more that happens, the less lonely they'll feel up on stage, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: They don't seem nearly as nervous as their first time on stage. Even if they're not next to each other, their hearts are one. That's what I love about the Nijigasaki idols.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I wonder if they'll announce the finalists soon.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm so nervous.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I hope I can make it to the finals this time!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Does standing on the finals stage feel different than standing on the preliminaries stage?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: What did you think when you were a finalist, Setsuna?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Well... I thought it felt quite different. It felt like everyone watching had really high expectations.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Was the pressure too much?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Nope! Right, Shizuku?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: That's right. It was more like a gentle push.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Really? I wanna stand on a stage like that too!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Me too. My costume is perfectly in place. I'm ready for the finals!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh! They're announcing the finalists now!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu, congrats! I'm as happy as if I won myself!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kasumi, you did it! I knew you'd make it to the finals!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shizuku, congrats! Your expressiveness is truly amazing!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Karin, congrats! I watched you countless times during practice, but I still ended up captivated.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yes! You made it to the finals, Ai! I'm happy I got to see the lively performance you promised yesterday!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kanata, congrats! Being true to yourself really paid off!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You're amazing, Setsuna! Let's aim for number one this time!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Emma, you made it to the finals! Me, and your brothers and sisters, and so many other people will be cheering you on!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Rina, congrats on ranking! Keep being yourself while you take on the finals!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Congrats! Try your best!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Congratulations! You worked so hard. I completely understand why you made it to the finals!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Whine* I'm frustrated, but congrats!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Whine* I'm frustrated, but congratulations!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wow! Wow, you're amazing! Congrats!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wow! Wow, you're amazing! Congratulations!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You did it! I can't wait to see your amazing performance!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Congrats! I may have lost today, but I won't lose next time! Please put on a wonderful performance!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Congratulations. It's all up to you now!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Sigh* I'm so disappointed! I'm happy you won though! Try your best!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Congrats! Here, drink some water before you go back on stage. Stay calm and try your best!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Okay, here I go!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm nervous. But I'll imagine that I'm with all of you and try my best!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Sob* I finally made it to the top! Well, almost. But the top position will be mine!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: My heart is racing. I'm trembling with excitement. Watch and see what I can do!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: All right, I did it! I just need to keep this up! Cheer for me, okay?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I really feel like I received everyone's power of love! Even when I was on stage, our hearts were one!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: All this support is too much pressure. But, I hold up well under pressure. Here I go now. Make sure to watch me!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Wow! I'm in the finals. I did good! I just have a little more to go, so please send me some power!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: This is like a dream! If I shared this news with the past me back in Switzerland who was dreaming of being a school idol, I would've fainted! I need to hurry before I wake up!
